comment: premature deaths are based on all-cause natural mortality covering all ages >= 30 years; "crf" (= conentration response function) log-linearity assumed; "min_conc_threshold" = minimum observed concentration yields outcomes due to anthropogenic pollution; see also Castro A. et al.
